properties.description: The title of the resource.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: The type of title.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Default field label is "Title".
properties.title: Display Label

properties.description:
For compound children only: Enter the primary title of the parent item.
This field is hidden.
properties.title: Parent Item Title

properties.description: Item number, object file name, accession number, or other identifier associated with the physical item.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description:
The type of identifier.
Suggested values include, but are not limited to, those specified in Standard Identifier Source Codes.
Use "local" for local item identifier.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Suggested field labels include "Item Number", "Object File Name", "Accession Number".
properties.title: DisplayLabel

properties.description: Select an institution name from the list. (Please alert LSU staff if your institution name does not appear on the list.)

options.index: ebrpl - East Baton Rouge Parish Library
hnoc - The Historic New Orleans Collection

properties.title: Repository

properties.description: If the contributing institution name is an authorized LC Name Authority File term, select 'LC NAF'.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: If the contributing institution name is an authorized LC Name Authority File term, select 'LC NAF'.
properties.title: Authority URI

properties.description: If the contributing institution name is an authorized LC Name Authority File term, enter the URI for the term.
properties.title: Value URI

properties.description:
Date the resource was created.
Prefer for born-digital and unpublished or informally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: Enter the date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: Select whether this is the one date by which to index the record. A resource should have one and only one Key Date.
properties.title: Key Date

properties.description: Use to qualify dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use to indicate the start and end point of a date range.
properties.title: Point

properties.description:
The date the object was issued.
Prefer for formally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version.
Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Enter the date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Select whether this is the one date by which to index the record. A resource should have one and only one Key Date.
properties.title: Key Date

properties.description: Use to qualify dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use to indicate the start and end point of a date range.
properties.title: Point

properties.description: Use for the date(s) on which the resource was digitized or a subsequent snapshot was taken, if different from Date Created or Date Issued.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: Single date only. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: Use with single dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use the drop down menu to select an authorized MODS value characterizing the resource’s format.
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description:
The file type of the digital resource.
Select from MIME Media Types List. Use all lowercase letters without punctuation: "image/jp2", "application/pdf", "audio/mpeg", "video/mp4".
properties.title: Internet Media Type

properties.description:
Use the drop down menu to select the method by which a resource achieved digital form.
This field is hidden.
properties.title: Digital Origin

properties.description: Information pertaining to the full collection.
properties.title: Host Collection

properties.description: Information pertaining to the digital collection as a whole.
properties.title: Digital Collection

properties.description: The title of the digital collection.
properties.title: Digital Collection

properties.description:
The URL of the digital collection landing page.
This field is hidden.
properties.title: Relation

properties.description: Use to enter a standardized statement from RightsStatements.org.
properties.title: Rights Statement

properties.description: Enter the name of the statement from RightsStatements.org, e.g. “No Known Copyright” or “In Copyright - Non-Commercial Use Permitted”.
properties.title: Rights Statement

properties.description: Enter the URI corresponding to the statement.
properties.title: Rights Statement URI

properties.description: Enter uncontrolled rights information either in place of or in addition to the standardized statement.
properties.title: Rights Information

properties.description: Contact information for the owning repository, including an email address.
properties.title: Contact Information

properties.description:
Information about the metadata record.
These fields are all hidden.
properties.title: Record Info

properties.description: The creator of the original MODS record. For original metadata records, enter the creator of the record in the format "institution_code/cataloger_initials."
properties.title: Record Content Source

properties.description: The date on which the original MODS record was first created, in format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Record Creation Date

properties.description: The date on which the MODS record was last modified, in format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Record Change Date

properties.description: The language of the text of the cataloging in the MODS record. Use the ISO alpha-3 encoding for the language used in cataloging the record. Note that this does not refer to the language of the resource itself.
properties.title: Language of Cataloging
